name: MAX (betadev)
description:
MAX is a Puzzle game where you shall reach the exit of the room you are in.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h from the Ludum Dare 37 Compo by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in C# on Unity.

Tools:

Unity

Adobe Photshop

Audacity

Maya

-----------------------

Directions:

You will learn them.

Movement -> WASD

When you push a Key that Key is pushed.

------------------------

Contact:

albertomelladoc@gmail.com

-----------------------

This was my 4th Ludum Dare entry and I am quite happy with the result. I think that ading more levels would have been great, but i didnt have time for it. Hope you enjoy it.

-----------------------
